channel.title: A Little Peice Of Heaven - Hadlich4, and Poopler, and another guy :D
channel.description:
[center]A Little Peice Of Heaven[/center] [center]"Cause I really always knew that my little crime Would be cold that's why I got a heater for your thighs"[/center]
We definitely need a coder, im decent but not the best by far, if you wanna help please pm me with your recent work or any experience you have.
Me - Lead designer, Weapons and Amour Modeler, basic coder for now until we find a head coder.
Poopler - Npc Modeler and designer.
Me and poopler are starting a new project, not named yet :p. Any how we are going to take all jagex armour/weapon out, rune armour, god armours, all sets EVERYTHING! we wanna be ORIGINAL tired of all the rsps's that are the same thing, just remakes of rs, when i think of rsps i think unique, new, different, so ima make that happen.
Here are some of our goals:
[ul][li]Slave system - the slave system involves buying goblins and cottin gins or land and such from Eli Whitney. It may be something were you get a daily reward for the more land, slaves, and cottin gins you own not sure yet.[/li]
[li]Get rid of Jagex Amour and Weapons! - we wanna be unique and original so why not make our own stuff![/li][/ul]
[ul][li]Ship fighting Minigame? - ive had this minigame on my mind a lot, not sure exactly how its gunna work, and it may not, but with what i got in my mind if i can make it happen it would be an interesting addition to the game.[/li][/ul]
[ul][li]Classes - instead of making a person character like just humans maybe have classes or races like in skyrim its just a thought i had i know its possible.[/li][/ul]
what we need is designs, we already got some of course but any art from ya'll would help and it would give you a chance to see some of your stuff in the game. so go ahead design weapons and armour and npcs anything you would want to see in the game :D and if you dont wanna design let us know what you think of the project.
if you have a design you want me to look at pm me a picture, thanks.
March 17th 2013 EDIT:
ok so its been a while and many ideas have aroused and many things have been planned and done. heres a few more additions we are gunna make as well
[ul][li]City clans in a way - each city will have a npc who the character talks to and can get armour to signify that he is part of that cities clan. All cities will have a pay toll. if you want to enter that city u gotta pay a toll, the more important the city the more money. there will be level requirments to be part of each city. this will also give players a chance to have city wars if they feel the need.[/li] [li] Labor Unions - you will go to an npc (Mr.Pullman) and apply to work for him, you will be sent to an island to work and mine ores and other things and sell the ores to him for a certain amount of money and once you earn a certain amount of money you can teleport out, not gunna spoil the fun but from this feature there will be a way to get a new item called shout gauntlets, gauntlets that allow you to use a cool ass special :p[/li][/ul]
[ul][li]So me and another designer decided to make a change, we are keeping the basic sets, bronze-rune, range hides/bows, basic mage robes and just gunna take out the bosses and armour from bosses outa god war dungeon and other stuff and make our own, there will be our own dragon armour and weapons, and a new way to acquire them, now you will make it from dragon scales and horns. we are also gunna keep barrows armour and barrows minigame. but basically besides those things, all other armour/ weapons are gunna be gone. [/li][/ul]
please tell me what you think of the ideas, thanks!

item.title: A Little Peice Of Heaven - Hadlich4, and Poopler, and another guy :D
item.dc:creator: @I_Love_College I Love College
item.description:
@I_Love_College wrote:

I wish I could join but I am no where near experienced enough, sounds awesome though, i’ll follow this ;D

Read full topic
item.source: A Little Peice Of Heaven - Hadlich4, and Poopler, and another guy :D

item.title: A Little Peice Of Heaven - Hadlich4, and Poopler, and another guy :D
item.dc:creator: @DemonWars DemonWars
item.description:
@DemonWars wrote:

I am glad to see fresh blood on to coding.
I was discouraged by the lack of skill here lately.
It seems like my genaration has passed.
The time that coders actually made some unique things seems to be passed.
So i am asking you to show me they have not.
IF you indeed posses the skills to show me they have not.
I shall contact you once more in a more private manner.
Untill then i leave you with a piece of advice:
~A variable is everything. Nothing is limited so don’t make borders for your own mind.

King’s Regards:
Demonwars

Read full topic
item.source: A Little Peice Of Heaven - Hadlich4, and Poopler, and another guy :D

I can help you if you want maybe ill join.

Read full topic

item.title: A Little Peice Of Heaven - Hadlich4, and Poopler, and another guy :D
item.dc:creator: @hadlich4 hadlich4
item.description:
@hadlich4 wrote:

[quote=“DemonWars, post:6, topic:486436”]Looks interesting.
beware that forming and coding armour is harder then it looks.
yet i do support you’re idea.
i wish you goodluck (:
i’ll be watching

King’s Regards
DemonWars[/quote]

oh yes i know haha i used to add armour/weapons to show friends to my old rsps it was just a thing i made to talk to friends and all and everything i added usually turned out great, but thanks for the support

Read full topic

the elve age:

What? No I’m not joining this, I said I could help you if you needed it. I never said I was joining a new project.

Lol’d

item.title: A Little Peice Of Heaven - Hadlich4, and Poopler, and another guy :D
item.dc:creator: @CarlosATheTruth CarlosATheTruth
item.description:
@CarlosATheTruth wrote:

I want to join

BASIC COMMENTS:I am really good at coding servers, i will not bacstab, ddos, hack (don’t know how to).
I also won’t steal files and leave, i’ll code until the end.

Name:Carlos Aviles
Email:carlosavilesoffical@gmail.com
Age: 14.
Experienced: 2 years experienced, i learn coding fast, and i know how to code (alot).
Active: 8-10 hours weekdays
10-12 hours weekends

item.title: A Little Peice Of Heaven - Hadlich4, and Poopler, and another guy :D
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

It would be better if you made a more exciting page, when i opened it up and say a paragraph of text i almost died.

I don’t know if the idea is thought out that well, it just sounds like something you want to do instead of something you intend to do. Maybe next time just make dot points for what key features you want instead of the whole paragraph.

Read full topic
